hypothesis_content.title: ETF Flow Momentum Reversal Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: A daily net inflow of $300M+ into US Spot Bitcoin ETFs after 3+ consecutive outflow days triggers a 48-hour BTC price momentum surge of at least 3% above the entry close, with the effect being strongest during NEUTRAL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Recent news highlights ETF flow momentum reversal. Large inflows after sustained outflows signal renewed institutional confidence and can trigger short covering + FOMO, creating a short-term momentum pulse. Neutral regimes lack strong directional bias, making this catalyst more impactful.
entry_conditions: BTC Spot ETF net daily inflow >= $300M
Preceded by >= 3 consecutive days of net outflows
Entry at next day's open after flow data publication

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC price increases 3% from entry price
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price decreases 2% from entry price

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If, after the entry condition is met, BTC fails to achieve a 3% gain within 48 hours more than 55% of the time in a sample of 20+ instances.
